title: If my husband put a security camera in our house to spy on me,
description: 10-02-2018 If your husband put a security camera up to spy on you, yes, you have a right to be upset. Even if there was infidelity involved, putting up a camera to spy on a spouse shows a complete lack of trust and lack of forgiveness, and frankly there is no point in maintaining the relationship at that point.

title: My Husband Is Spying on Me | PairedLife
description: 07-03-2017 Put the emphasis on you rather than on your partner. Their reaction will often be a big clue as to what is going on. If your spouse is eager to reassure you, they may offer you their passwords so you can put your own mind at rest by checking their internet and phone activity. Remember that spying on them without their permission is a violation of their privacy.
